author: Staff Reporter
text:
Efforts by unidentified persons to break open Indian Overseas Bank’s Automated Teller Machine (ATM) near Veterinary College and Research Institute premises on Mohanur Road failed here on Tuesday.

The incident came to light on Tuesday morning when people who went to withdraw money found the ATM machine damaged. Also, the closed circuit television was also damaged. Mohanur police said that unidentified persons broke the surveillance camera and attempted to loot the ATM.

However, they could not open the chest box.

Hence, their attempted failed. The police registered a case and are investigating. Bank officials said that about Rs. 9 lakh cash was in the machine when the incident took place.
title: Robbery attempt at ATM
